meanings.definition: A person who enjoys eating and often eats large quantities of food.
meanings.sent1: The gormands at the buffet were piling their plates high with delicious food.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a gormands among her friends for her love of trying new dishes.
meanings.sent3: The gormands at the party were the first ones in line for the dessert table.
meanings.sent4: His appetite was like that of a gormands, always ready for another helping.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gormands feasting at the feast was a sight to behold.
